header.gameNote: COLONIAL ATHLETIC ASSN TR AT RICHMOND VA

article.headline: George Mason 61, Georgia St 56 (OT)
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) -- Sammy Hernandez scored five of his eight points in overtime, including the 3-pointer that gave George Mason the lead for good, and the Patriots beat Georgia State 61-56 in the Colonial Athletic Association quarterfinals Saturday. Hernandez' 3-pointer with 3:29 left in the extra period gave second-seeded George Mason a 52-49 lead, and they barely held on against the 10th-seeded Panthers (7-22). The Patriots (23-7), who got 19 points from Will Thomas and 12 points and 13 rebounds from Jai Lewis, will play Virginia Commonwealth or Hofstra in Sunday's semifinals. Georgia State, with former coach Lefty Driesell looking on from the stands, used an 11-1 run in the second half to take a 43-41 lead with 4:20 left, but needed two free throws by Herman Favors with 33 seconds to play in regulation to tie it at 47. After Rashad Chase made two free throws for the Panthers to begin the extra period, Hernandez made a layup and then a 3-pointer, giving George Mason the lead for good. The Panthers twice closed to within a point, but Tony Skinn and then Thomas answered with layups and the co-CAA champions held on to avoid an embarrassing defeat.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.
